sum_bfield.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 !  ===================================================================
00002 !
00003 !                              SUM_BFIELD
00004 !
00005 !   Calculate vector potential and b-field of particle from interaction list
00006 !
00007 !  ===================================================================
00008 
00009 subroutine sum_bfield( p, n, inode, eps, sumbx, sumby, sumbz, sumax, sumay, sumaz )
00010   use treevars
00011   implicit none
00012   integer, intent(in) :: p  ! particle label 
00013   integer, intent(in) :: n  !  # terms on interaction list
00014   integer, dimension(1:n) ::  inode
00015   real, intent(in) :: eps ! smoothing parameter
00016   integer :: jnode, i,j,k 
00017 
00018   real*8 :: rd,dx,dy,dz,d,dx2,dy2,dz2 
00019  real*8 :: dx3,dy3,dz3,rd3,rd5,rdotj,rdotm
00020  real*8 :: fsx,fsy,fsz,phi
00021  real, dimension(n*10) :: mult 
00022  real, dimension(n*3) :: coc
00023   real*8, intent(out) ::  sumax,sumay,sumaz,sumbx, sumby, sumbz 
00024   real :: eps2
00025 
00026   eps2=eps**2
00027   sumax = 0
00028   sumay = 0
00029   sumaz = 0
00030   sumbx = 0
00031   sumby = 0
00032   sumbz = 0
00033 
00034 ! copy multipole moments into stride 1 array
00035   do j=1,n
00036     jnode=inode(j)
00037     i = (j-1)*10+1
00038 !    k = (j-1)*3+1
00039 !    coc(k) = xcoc(jnode)
00040 !    coc(k+1) = ycoc(jnode)
00041 !    coc(k+2) = zcoc(jnode)
00042     mult(i) = jx(jnode)
00043     mult(i+1) = jy(jnode)
00044     mult(i+2) = jz(jnode)
00045     mult(i+3) = magmx(jnode)
00046     mult(i+4) = magmy(jnode)
00047     mult(i+5) = magmz(jnode)
00048   end do
00049 
00050   do j=1,n
00051      
00052   !  preprocess distances
00053      i = 10*(j-1) + 1  ! multipole index
00054 !     k = 3*(j-1) + 1  ! coc index
00055      jnode=inode(j)
00056      dx = x(p) - xcoc(jnode)
00057      dy = y(p) - ycoc(jnode)
00058      dz = z(p) - zcoc(jnode) 
00059 
00060      d = sqrt(dx**2+dy**2+dz**2+eps2)
00061      rd = 1./d
00062      rd3 = rd**3
00063      rd5 = rd**5
00064 
00065      rdotm = dx*magmx(jnode) + dy*magmy(jnode) + dz*magmz(jnode)
00066      rdotj = dx*jx(jnode) + dy*jy(jnode) + dz*jz(jnode)
00067 
00068      ! vector potential (magnetoinductive)
00069 
00070      sumax = sumax + 0.5*jx(jnode)*rd + 0.5*dx*rdotj*rd3        !  monopole term
00071 !     + ( dz*magmy(jnode) - dy*magmz(jnode) )*rd3   !  dipole 
00072 
00073      sumay = sumay + 0.5*jy(jnode)*rd + 0.5*dy*rdotj*rd3          !  monopole term
00074 !     + ( dx*magmz(jnode) - dz*magmx(jnode) )*rd3  !  dipole 
00075 
00076      sumaz = sumaz + 0.5*jz(jnode)*rd + 0.5*dz*rdotj*rd3         !  monopole term
00077 !     + ( dy*magmx(jnode) - dx*magmy(jnode) )*rd3  !  dipole 
00078 
00079 
00080 
00081      ! B-field
00082 
00083      sumbx = sumbx + ( jy(jnode)*dz - jz(jnode)*dy)*rd3       ! monopole term
00084 !       + 3*dx*rd5*rdotm - magmx(jnode)*rd3
00085 
00086      sumby = sumby + ( jz(jnode)*dx - jx(jnode)*dz)*rd3       ! monopole term
00087 !       + 3*dy*rd5*rdotm - magmy(jnode)*rd3
00088 
00089      sumbz = sumbz + ( jx(jnode)*dy - jy(jnode)*dx)*rd3       ! monopole term
00090 !       + 3*dz*rd5*rdotm - magmz(jnode)*rd3
00091 
00092 
00093 
00094 
00095   end do
00096 
00097 
00098 
00099 end subroutine sum_bfield
